title: ct-drag-drop: Create ct-drag-source component
description:
Create packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-drag-source/

Properties:
- cell: Cell (required) - the cell being dragged
- type: string (optional) - type identifier for filtering
- disabled: boolean (optional) - disable dragging

Events:
- ct-drag-start -> { cell: Cell }
- ct-drag-end -> { cell: Cell, dropped: boolean }

Implementation:
- Extend BaseElement
- Internally wrap slot with ct-cell-context
- Pointer Events for drag initiation (pointerdown, pointermove, pointerup)
- Create drag preview on drag start
- Use [UI] from cell if available, else ct-cell-link fallback
- Append preview to document.body with fixed positioning

description:

- Properties: items (Cell[]), value (Cell<unknown>|unknown), minHeight, disabled
- CellController for value binding with immediate timing strategy
- Basic constructor and property declarations

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-select/ct-select.ts

2. Add JSX types to packages/html/src/jsx.d.ts:

title: ct-picker: Update ct-select demo pattern
description:
Update packages/patterns/ct-select.tsx to demonstrate ct-picker + ct-select sync:
- Create list of Counter patterns (or similar with UI)
- Add ct-picker bound to selection cell
- Add ct-select bound to same cell (using NAME for labels)
- Show that changing one updates the other

This serves as both documentation and integration test.

title: Create shared utility cell-schema.ts
description: Extract getCellSchema from llm-dialog.ts, add buildMinimalSchemaFromValue, add getCellDescription. Location: packages/runner/src/builtins/cell-schema.ts

title: Add favoriteEntrySchema to manager.ts
description: Add favoriteEntrySchema and favoriteListSchema definitions. Location: packages/charm/src/manager.ts

title: ct-drag-source: Fix click blocking
description:
ct-drag-source captures pointerdown and prevents clicks from working (e.g., ct-cell-context debugger buttons).

Fix: Only capture pointer and prevent default AFTER drag threshold is crossed, not on pointerdown. This allows normal clicks to work.

title: ct-drag-drop: Create ct-drop-zone component
description:
Create packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-drop-zone/

Properties:
- cell: Cell (optional) - context cell to pass in drop event
- accept: string (optional) - filter by drag source type (comma-separated)

Events:
- ct-drag-enter -> { cell: Cell, type?: string }
- ct-drag-leave -> { cell: Cell }
- ct-drop -> { sourceCell: Cell, targetCell?: Cell, type?: string }

Implementation:
- Extend BaseElement
- Subscribe to drag state changes
- Visual feedback on drag-over (CSS class)
- Detect drops via document.elementsFromPoint on pointerup
- Emit ct-drop event (pattern handles linking)

title: Update favorites.ts for new structure
description: Import getCellDescription from runner. Update getHomeFavorites(), addFavorite(), removeFavorite(), isFavorite() for { cell, tag } structure. Location: packages/charm/src/favorites.ts

title: ct-drag-drop: Create shared drag state module
description:
Create packages/ui/src/v2/core/drag-state.ts with:
- DragState interface (cell, type, sourceElement, preview, previewCleanup)
- Module-level singleton to track current drag operation
- Export: startDrag(), endDrag(), getCurrentDrag(), isDragging()
- Event emitter pattern for drop zones to subscribe to drag state changes

title: ct-drop-zone: Invert drop detection model
description:
Current model: drag-source uses elementsFromPoint on pointerup to find drop zones.

Better model: drop-zones should poll during active drag (subscribe to drag state) and check if pointer is within their bounding box. This makes drop zones self-contained and enables proper visual feedback.

Changes needed:
- Drop zone subscribes to drag state
- On pointermove during drag, check if pointer intersects bounding box
- Update drag-over state and emit events accordingly
- Remove elementsFromPoint logic from drag-source

title: Export getCellSchema from runner index.ts
description: Export getCellSchema and getCellDescription from cell-schema.ts. Location: packages/runner/src/index.ts

title: ct-drop-zone: Remove cell prop - event-only model
description:
The drop zone doesn't need a cell binding. It's purely behavioral:
- Marks a region as droppable
- Emits ct-drop event with the source cell
- Pattern handler decides what to do (store in state, link cells, etc.)

Changes:
- Remove cell property from ct-drop-zone
- Simplify ct-drop event to just { sourceCell, type }
- Update example pattern to show the event-only model

title: Integrate Suggestion pattern
description: Add AI suggestion powered by Suggestion pattern

title: ct-picker: Write unit tests
description:
Create packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-picker/ct-picker.test.ts with tests for:
- Renders items correctly
- Value binding works bidirectionally
- Keyboard navigation cycles through items
- Arrow click handlers work
- Touch swipe detection works
- ARIA attributes are correct
- Disabled state prevents interaction

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-select/ct-select.test.ts

title: Implement todo list base functionality

description: Verify pattern works with deno task ct dev

title: Create todo-with-suggestion pattern
description: Create packages/patterns/todo-with-suggestion.tsx - a todo list pattern that uses the Suggestion pattern for AI-powered suggestions

title: ct-picker: Implement touch/swipe gestures
description:
Add touch support following ct-slider pattern:
- Track touchStartX on touchstart
- Calculate deltaX on touchend
- Swipe right (deltaX > threshold): Select previous
- Swipe left (deltaX < -threshold): Select next
- Use threshold of ~50px
- Add touch-action: none CSS during swipe

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-slider/ct-slider.ts (touch handlers)

title: ct-picker: Add styling
description:
CSS requirements:
- Full width of container (width: 100%)
- Configurable min-height (default 200px), user can set explicit height
- Cards contained/clipped within bounds (overflow: hidden)
- Arrow indicators vertically centered (top: 50%, transform: translateY(-50%))
- Arrows visible on hover with smooth opacity fade
- Smooth transitions for future animation support
- touch-action: none during swipe
- Disabled state styling (opacity, cursor)

title: ct-picker: Implement keyboard navigation
description:
Add keyboard support following ct-slider pattern:
- ArrowLeft/ArrowUp: Select previous item
- ArrowRight/ArrowDown: Select next item  
- Home: Select first item
- End: Select last item
- Wrap around at edges
- Add keydown listener in connectedCallback, remove in disconnectedCallback

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-slider/ct-slider.ts (_handleKeyDown)

title: ct-drag-drop: Create example pattern
description:
Create a simple drag-drop demo pattern in packages/patterns/

Demonstrate:
- Draggable items with ct-drag-source
- Drop zone with ct-drop-zone
- Handler that links cells on drop
- Visual feedback during drag operations

title: ct-picker: Add ARIA accessibility
description:
Add accessibility attributes:
- role='listbox' on component
- tabIndex management (0 when enabled, -1 when disabled)
- aria-activedescendant pointing to current item
- aria-disabled reflecting disabled state
- Each rendered item should have role='option'

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-slider/ct-slider.ts (ARIA setup)

title: ct-picker: Implement rendering and card stack display
description:
Implement the render() method:
- Container with overflow:hidden for card stack
- Use ct-render to display each item's Cell UI
- Fall back to ct-cell-link for cells without [UI]
- Position cards with selected item visible
- Add left/right arrow buttons (vertically centered)
- Arrows appear on hover with smooth fade

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-render/ct-render.ts

title: ct-cell-context: Debug regions with cell inspection
description: Create a ct-cell-context component that wraps page regions, associates them with a Cell, and provides debugging tools. Activation: Alt+hover. Watch table: Debug drawer tab. Always enabled.

title: Create ct-cell-context component structure
description: Create packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-cell-context/ with index.ts and ct-cell-context.ts. Extend BaseElement, add cell property (attribute: false), label property, and internal state for _modifierHeld and _isHovered.

title: Implement Alt+hover toolbar activation
description: Add document-level keydown/keyup listeners for Alt key. Track _modifierHeld state. Show toolbar only when Alt held AND hovering. Position toolbar top-right absolutely.

title: Add console logging actions (val/id buttons)
description: Add toolbar with 'val' button (logs cell.get()) and 'id' button (logs cell.getAsNormalizedFullLink()). System UI styling: hard black 1px borders, no radius, monospace font, semi-transparent white background.

title: Export ct-cell-context from UI package
description: Add export to packages/ui/src/v2/index.ts for ct-cell-context component.

title: Add watch button with cell.sink() subscription
description: Phase 2: Add 'watch' button to toolbar. Subscribe to cell changes via cell.sink(). Log updates to console with value, path, and update count. Clean up subscription in disconnectedCallback.

title: Add WatchedCell management to DebuggerController
description: Phase 2: Add WatchedCell interface and Map to debugger-controller.ts. Implement watchCell(cell, label) and unwatchCell(id) methods. Track lastValue, lastUpdate, updateCount per watched cell.

title: Add Watch List tab to DebuggerView
description: Phase 3: Add tabs to DebuggerView (Events | Watch List). Watch List shows pinned cells with value, update count, last update time. Include unwatch button to remove from list.

title: Add localStorage persistence for watched cells
description: Phase 3: Persist watched cell references to localStorage. Restore watches when runtime reconnects. Key: debuggerWatchedCells.

title: ct-picker: Implement selection synchronization
description:
Implement selection sync with value cell:
- Track currentIndex internally based on value
- Find matching item index when value cell changes externally
- Update value cell via _cellController.setValue() when user cycles
- Use areLinksSame() for comparing cell references
- Emit ct-change event on selection change

Reference: packages/ui/src/v2/components/ct-select/ct-select.ts (applyValueToDom)
